entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • U #26736
  • Flyout Items Not Displayed in RightToLeft FlowDirection on iOS in Landscape Orientation and Hamburger Icon Positioned Incorrectly #26726
  • Image Picker stuck on iOS with .NET 8 #26721

Closed

  • [MAUI] I5_ EmptyView - No string is shown in the three 'EmptyView String' pages #26663
    .NET 9 SR3
  • App crashes when you clear a group's record in CollectionView #20819
  • Custom controls for complex type properties must be wrapped with layout to work #25236
  • Local resources not working in release configuration with more than one resource inside #26206
    .NET 9 SR3
  • Mac Catalyst does not support resizing or repositioning windows programmatically #9704
    .NET 9 SR3
  • BindableLayout.ItemsSource no longer works in 8.0.61 #23491
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • .Net Maui Crash OnResume #26601
  • The RealParent on Syncfusion.Maui.PdfViewer.SfPdfViewer has been Garbage Collected. #26666
  • tutorial(macos): Fresh XCode 16.2 errors out when trying the Run with Debug step #26686
  • Android-CollectionView - MeasureFIrstItem breaks layout #21778
  • Android - CollectionView scroll wrong item when set animation is false #26191
  • NavigationPage navigation on Android without Shell yields java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: No destination with ID 2 is on the NavController's back stack. The current destination is Destination(0x1) class=crc6452ffdc5b34af3a0f.NavigationViewFragment #26375
  • [iOS] App Freezes When Pressing Return Key in Editor with Text Binding to Entry #26341
  • BindTapGesture shows error in .net 9 #26088

PullRequests

Created

  • [Windows] Fix titlebar not being added to modals #26735
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-titlebar, .NET 9 SR2.2
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 59 #26731
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 58 #26730
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed IsEnabled Property not works on Tabs #26728
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix up relevant CA1416 warnings - Set 2 #26724
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed [Android] ListView scroll position maintains after items refresh #26723
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Optimize `LayoutHandler.Windows.cs` (take 3) #26722
    community ✨
  • Radio button's default template improvements #26719
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-radiobutton

Merged

  • [iOS] Set height for EmptyView if is not an IView #26680
    area-controls-collectionview, i/regression, .NET 9 SR3
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 51 #26656
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 53 #26675
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [XC] fix excessive boxing #26465
    area-xaml, .NET 9 SR3
  • Add the scenario tests for the skiasharp backend #26591
    area-testing, .NET 9 SR3
  • Fix install #26734
  • [Mac Catalyst] Set window dimensions #24001
    platform/macOS 🍏, p/1, community ✨, area-controls-window, .NET 9 SR3
  • [ci] Always install .net #26729
    area-infrastructure
  • [ci] Update stable Android version #26684
    area-infrastructure, .NET 9 SR3
  • The fix for child FlexLayout content appearing no longer works starting from version 8.0.61 #26665
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR3
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 54 #26676
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [release/9.0.1xx-sr2] Revert "[Windows] `FileSystem.Current.AppDataDirectory` returns different path after updating to latest version - fix" #26713
    p/0, .NET 9 SR2.2

Updated

  • Flyout Icon - RTL support #26737
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-flyoutpage, community ✨, area-controls-flyout
  • Fix TabBar visibility when navigating back from a non-tabbed page to a tabbed page #25004
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR3
  • [Windows] Fix Shell animation and button visual states on Shell nav #26521
    area-navigation
  • Change iOS SetNeedsLayout propagation mechanism #26629
    area-layout, community ✨, .NET 9 SR3
  • [ci] Add unit test jobs to dnceng builds #26623
    area-testing
  • [Android] Ensure all controls in Layout with Search Bar are visible in Landscape Mode #24198
    community ✨, area-controls-entry, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [iOS]Fix for Character Spacing Not Updating Correctly in Editor for Dynamically Added Text #25347
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 57 #26717
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix more things with fonts (embedded) and unpackaged apps #26515
    area-fonts
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 55 #26710
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed the FlyoutPage.Flyout Disappearing When Maximizing the Window on Mac Platform #26701
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed Extra Padding on iOS buttons required when image on top or bottom #26018
    community ✨, area-controls-button, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR3
  • CollectionView Items display issue when Header is resized on iOS #21812
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Fixed the ListView SelectedItem not cleared after the list is cleared #26712
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix for TabBar Navigation does not invoke its IQueryAttributable.ApplyQueryAttributes(query) #25663
    area-navigation, area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed Navigation Toolbar Visibility Issue on Dynamic Flyout Reset in FlyoutPage. #26693
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Optimize `LayoutHandler.Windows.cs` (take 2) #26460
    platform/windows 🪟, area-layout, community ✨, t/perf
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 56 #26716
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fix for UI not updating GridItemsLayout when Span becomes 1. #26370
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix for CollectionView SelectedItem loses Background after opening and closing a Modal page #26694
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed - [Windows] ListView Items Text Not Rendered inside the TabbedPage #26681
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-listview, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Shell toolbar items #20510
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [Windows] Fixed CollectionView ScrollTo Method Crash with Invalid GroupIndex Value. #26706
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
